SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY TPB.BOARD_NO DESC) AS ROW_NUM ,TPB.BOARD_NO ,TPC.CATEGORY_NAME ,TPB.BOARD_TITLE ,TPB.USER_NO ,TPU.USER_ID ,TPB.MOD_DATE FROM TP_BOARD TPB LEFT JOIN TP_CATEGORY TPC ON TPB.CATEGORY_NO = TPC.CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN TP_USER TPU ON TPB.USER_NO = TPU.USER_NO
AND DEL_FG = 0
AND CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo}
AND BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT TPB.BOARD_NO ,TPC.CATEGORY_NAME ,TPB.CATEGORY_NO ,TPB.BOARD_TITLE ,TPB.BOARD_CONTENT ,TPU.USER_ID ,TPB.MOD_DATE ,TPB.USER_NO FROM TP_BOARD TPB LEFT JOIN TP_CATEGORY TPC ON TPB.CATEGORY_NO = TPC.CATEGORY_NO LEFT JOIN TP_USER TPU ON TPB.USER_NO = TPU.USER_NO
AND DEL_FG = 0 AND BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}
